job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you ready to shape the future of digital content creation?
       We're seeking a QA Manual Engineer to join our innovative team! As a vital part of our growing team, you'll focus on managing and monitoring defects, ensuring timely resolutions, and collaborating closely with our development teams to deliver top-quality results. At , you'll move beyond traditional QA roles and work with cutting-edge technology and 3D content automation that brings creativity to life.
       About
       is an end-to-end content automation platform that empowers brands to produce infinite ad variations through CGI, rule-based generative AI, and post-production automation. It transforms master ad creatives into countless variations, enabling marketers to create visual adaptations effortlessly, maintain brand consistency, and save millions in production costs. turns master content into modular configurators for quick and easy creative adjustments, providing unparalleled scalability., + Thoroughly understand project specifications, designs, and requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
          + Create, maintain, and support detailed test documentation including test plans, suites, cases, checklists, and test data.
          + Conduct detailed manual functional and non-functional testing to identify potential issues.
          + Efficiently manage and monitor defects, ensuring timely resolutions and maintaining communication with development teams.
          + Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements in the testing lifecycle and implement effective solutions.
          + Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner to ensure software functionality aligns with user requirements and is delivered within project timelines.
job_details.full_text:
QA Manual Engineer

Are you ready to shape the future of digital content creation?
       We're seeking a QA Manual Engineer to join our innovative team! As a vital part of our growing team, you'll focus on managing and monitoring defects, ensuring timely resolutions, and collaborating closely with our development teams to deliver top-quality results. At , you'll move beyond traditional QA roles and work with cutting-edge technology and 3D content automation that brings creativity to life.
       About
       is an end-to-end content automation platform that empowers brands to produce infinite ad variations through CGI, rule-based generative AI, and post-production automation. It transforms master ad creatives into countless variations, enabling marketers to create visual adaptations effortlessly, maintain brand consistency, and save millions in production costs. turns master content into modular configurators for quick and easy creative adjustments, providing unparalleled scalability., + Thoroughly understand project specifications, designs, and requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
          + Create, maintain, and support detailed test documentation including test plans, suites, cases, checklists, and test data.
          + Conduct detailed manual functional and non-functional testing to identify potential issues.
          + Efficiently manage and monitor defects, ensuring timely resolutions and maintaining communication with development teams.
          + Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements in the testing lifecycle and implement effective solutions.
          + Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner to ensure software functionality aligns with user requirements and is delivered within project timelines.

analysis.rationale: The job description focuses on manual QA engineering, defect management, and traditional testing processes. While it mentions 'generative AI' in the context of the company's platform, the core responsibilities of the role do not involve developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models, nor do they align with the core tasks of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases.phrase: Thoroughly understand project specifications, designs, and requirements to ensure comprehensive test coverage.
phrases.justification: This phrase directly relates to understanding project requirements and specifications to inform testing strategy, which is a key aspect of business understanding in a QA context.

phrases.phrase: Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner to ensure software functionality aligns with user requirements and is delivered within project timelines.
phrases.justification: This highlights collaboration with various teams to ensure alignment with user requirements and project timelines, demonstrating an understanding of business and product goals.

phrases.phrase: collaborating closely with our development teams
phrases.justification: While not directly developing software, the role requires close collaboration with development teams, implying an understanding of the software development lifecycle and integration points.

phrases.phrase: collaborating closely with our development teams
phrases.justification: Directly indicates collaboration with development teams.

phrases.phrase: Work closely with development, design, and product management teams in an Agile manner
phrases.justification: Highlights close collaboration with multiple teams.

phrases.phrase: managing and monitoring defects, ensuring timely resolutions
phrases.justification: Implies problem-solving to identify, track, and ensure resolution of issues.

phrases.phrase: Proactively identify opportunities for process improvements in the testing lifecycle and implement effective solutions.
phrases.justification: Demonstrates a pragmatic approach to problem-solving by seeking and implementing improvements.

phrases.phrase: work with cutting-edge technology and 3D content automation
phrases.justification: Suggests the need to adapt to and work with new technologies.
